elements.notes: headings are changed dynamically depending on Time selection. If 'Last 7 Days' is selected, the headings will be 7 dates (e.g., 03/13, 03/14..) including today. Otherwise, the headings will be N months (e.g., Jan, Feb..) including this month. The last heading 'Total' should be appended

elements.cell types: Number of exposures on each date or month, and the total number
elements.notes: The total number should be the sum of all numbers in the previous cells
